LEAD: Callaway Anne Ludington, the daughter of Gail C. Ludington of Boston and William F. Ludington of Stamford, Conn., was married yesterday to Michael Paul Zuccarello, a son of Dr. and Mrs. Louis C. Zuccarello of Poughkeepsie, N.Y. The Rev. Richard LaMorte officiated at Our Lady Star of the Sea Roman Catholic Church in

Callaway Anne Ludington, the daughter of Gail C. Ludington of Boston and William F. Ludington of Stamford, Conn., was married yesterday to Michael Paul Zuccarello, a son of Dr. and Mrs. Louis C. Zuccarello of Poughkeepsie, N.Y. The Rev. Richard LaMorte officiated at Our Lady Star of the Sea Roman Catholic Church in Stamford.

Mrs. Zuccarello, 26 years old, graduated from the University of Virginia and is a freelance reporter. The bridegroom, 25, a graduate of Fordham University, is a sports reporter and columnist in the Raleigh, N.C., bureau of The Winston-Salem (N.C.) Journal.
